meanings.definition: A photograph made by a process on glass that has been coated with a silver solution.
meanings.sent1: The ambrotype showed a clear image on the glass.
meanings.sent2: I saw an ambrotype of my grandparents in the antique shop.
meanings.sent3: The ambrotype on the glass looked like a magical mirror.
meanings.sent4: Her smile in the ambrotype seemed frozen in time.
meanings.sent5: The ambrotype captured the moment with stunning clarity.

meanings.definition: A positive photograph made by a process on a silver plate.
meanings.sent1: The ambrotype on the silver plate had a unique shine.
meanings.sent2: Collectors value ambrotypes for their historical significance.
meanings.sent3: The ambrotype on the silver plate seemed to wink at me.
meanings.sent4: His ambition was an ambrotype, reflecting his determination.
meanings.sent5: The ambrotype on the silver plate gleamed like a precious treasure.
